column1: starts off with a ball down the legside, gets called a wide
full ball wide of off-stump, lets the ball go through to the keeper. Rahim has to dive forward to pick up the ball
comes back in off the pitch and they all go up for the appeal, Umpire just shakes his head
dropped! Its clipped in the air towards square leg. Nasir gets two hands to the ball and drops a simple catch. Latham had already started walking off...
gets punished next ball as Latham cuts the ball hard through backward point
driven into the covers
outside off-stump and its angled down to third man to finish the over
wide outside off-stump, the batsman gets up on his toes and angles the ball down to third man
pitched up and its defended into the on-side, Bowler runs over and fields off his own bowling
wide of off-stump, Ronchi gives himself some room and almost chops the ball back onto his stumps. Mustafizur has his head in his hands
gets onto the front foot and turns the ball towards mid-on
its a full ball on legstump, Latham plants the front foot down and clips it through square leg. No fielder there and it goes to the boundary
full ball again, digs the ball out and it goes through cover point. Sets off for the run quickly
stays back in the crease and defends a short ball back down the pitch.
too much room outside off-stump from Mortaza, cuts the ball hard through cover point and it races to the rope
stays in the crease and pulls the ball towards mid-wicket, goes straight to the fielder
Latham is flying here this morning, stays in the crease and punches the ball off the back foot through the covers. The Fielders dont move as it goes to the boundary
stays in the crease again and drives the ball along the ground to extra cover
comes round the wicket to Latham, still too much room and cuts it cover along the ground.
full ball driven up towards mid-off, its perfectly placed and they run through for the single
full ball, Latham gets onto the front foot and defends the ball into the covers
wide of off-stump and its guided down to backward point. Sabbir lets the ball go through him and they pinch a run. Bit sloppy this morning from Bangladesh
Ronchi looks to drive a good length ball over the top. Goes a mile in the air and Shakib gets under the ball at extra cover and takes the catch. Nothing sloppy about that one!
full ball and Latham flicks the wrist, goes along the ground to mid-on
gets into the front foot, gets bat and pad together to defend back up the pitch
looks to flick the ball down the legside, misses and gets hit on the thigh pad. Goes along the ground to long leg
pops up off a good length, Latham goes back in the crease and defends the ball back down the pitch
looks to turn the ball into the legside, is through the shot too early and gets hit high on the pads.
good length ball again, still no foot movement from Latham. Hangs the bat out there and defends into the off-side
strays onto the legstump, flicks the pad and goes down past the keeper. Rahim can only just turn his head as the ball goes to the boundary
gets up on his toes and plays the ball to wide mid-wicket, Latham calls for the quick run to keep the strike
driven along the ground to Mahmudullah at mid-off, its another mis-field and they run through for the single
gets hit on the pad and they appeal for the LBW, going down legside though
full ball clipped to square leg, this time the fielder stops the ball
wide of off-stump, driven by Broom into the off-side.
its a full ball outside off-stump, Broom gets onto the front foot and drives it through extra cover. No stopping that one
goes a touch shorter, Broom gets some bat on the ball and plays it down into the ground before point
goes back in the crease, waits for the spin and pulls it out to deep mid-wicket, stopped on the rope
gets onto the front foot and defends back down the pitch
gets a large stride in and defends into the off-side
Umpire signals a dead ball, went down the legside and there was no shot played
gets down early and sweeps the ball to the long leg boundary. Lovely shot
drives the ball through extra cover again, its a long chase for the fielder and as he gets to the ball his momentum takes him over the rope. Another boundary to Latham
its wide of off-stump, Broom gets down on one knee and drives the ball to extra cover. Shakib fields
wide of off-stump again and its driven to Shakib at extra cover again, this time its a stumbling stop by the fielder
good length ball, stops a little off the pitch and Broom defends it back to the bowler
gets onto the front foot and drives the ball through the covers, Shakib dives to his left to make an excellent stop
gets forward and turns the ball towards Mosaddek at wide mid-on
gets onto the front foot and looks to angle the ball down to third man, goes in the air just past a diving second slip
gets forward and drives the ball through extra cover, Latham turns quickly for the second
gets forward and defends square on the off-side
drops short and its too easy for the batsman to pull the ball into the legside
goes back in the crease and pulls the ball into the on-side
goes back in the crease and plays the ball back to the bowler
comes down the pitch and clips the ball through square leg, easy single ends the over
angles the ball across Broom, gets onto the front foot and cross-bats the ball into the covers
slower ball outside off-stump, Broom gets onto the front foot again and defends into the covers. Shakib is being kept busy and fields the ball
full ball on legstump, Broom clips the ball past the fielder at square leg and it races all the way to the boundary
full ball again from Mustafizur, gets driven from the crease to mid-off
too much room again outside off-stump, Broom swings at the ball and it flew to the extra cover boundary
goes short, Broom gets up on his toes and plays the ball back into the pitch. Played that delivery very well.
goes back in the crease, plays with the spin and hits it through mid-wikcet
gets onto the front foot and guides the ball out to point
driven back past the bowler
comes down the pitch and doesn't quite get to the ball, defends into the legside
cuts the ball out to the cover sweeper
defends the ball through cover point, Latham sets off quickly from the non-strikers end for the single
outside off-stump again from Rubel, guides the ball into the ground and it goes to the fielder at point
its on legstump, Broom gets his bat forward and plays the ball to the square leg boundary. Fielder back there so its only a single
goes short, Latham hangs on the back foot and drives the ball into the covers
good length ball again from Rubel, Latham is on the back foot and defends
onto the front foot and punches the ball into the covers, stopped quickly by the fielder
its another good length ball, Latham stays in the crease and defends the ball back down the pitch
wide of off-stump. Broom gets forward and strokes the ball through extra cover
hits back to the bowler, Shakib fields off his own bowling
gets down on one knee and sweeps the ball down towards long leg, no chance for the fielder at square leg cutting that off!
gets to the pitch of the ball and drives it up to long-on
waits for the spin and then pulls the ball through square leg
its wide of off-stump and Latham punches the ball out to the cover sweeper again
its in the slot and Latham gives it everything, pulls the ball towards the mid-wicket boundary. Bounces just before the rope
better ball from Rubel, its full and Latham is happy to defend the ball back down the pitch
swings down the legside and its clipped down to long leg
on legstump again, clipped through square leg and fielded on the boundary again
wide of off-stump, the batsman angles the bat and plays the ball down to backard point
Rubel bends the back and tries to get a little more bounce, makes it easier for Latham to guide the ball down to third man
goes back in the crease and pulls the first ball from Mosaddek to deep square leg
on legstump and its flicked through square leg again, Shakib fields
drops short and its pulled to square leg, that's fifty for Latham
waits for the spin and cuts the ball out through the covers

dropped. Its hit back towards the bowler and Broom doesnt move as Mosaddek tries to get to the ball. He appeals for an Obstruction and after checking with the TV Umpire the Umpires don't agree. Should have still caught the ball though
pulls the ball to deep square leg
gets onto the front foot and defends the ball into the on-side, Mosaddek fields
looks to flick the ball into the legside, misses and gets hit on the pad. Big appeal, but was going down the legside
gets onto the front foot and defends back down the pitch
gets onto the front foot and looks to drive the ball forward, gets an inside edge down onto his own feet. Broom calls quickly for the run
gets forward and punches the ball along the ground to mid-on
unlucky! Looks to flick the ball into the legside, is through the shot too quickly. Gets a leading edge into the covers, no fielder there to grab the ball though!
looks to flick the ball into the legside again, gets hit on the pad. Going down the legside
guides the ball down to third man, Latham wants the run and gets sent back
turns the ball to short mid-on
goes back in the crease and pulls the ball through square leg
short and wide of off-stump, cuts the ball hard out to deep point
gets onto the front foot and defends the ball back down the pitch. That's drinks
its wide of off-stump and Latham cuts the ball out to the cover sweeper
Broom stays in the crease and drops the bat down onto the ball, gets a thick edge down to third man
looks to clip the ball into the legside, gets beaten for pace and is hit high on the thigh pad.
gets forward and its a little edge on the ball, goes into the ground and the fielder has to run up from point to field
its wide of off-stump and Broom flings the bat at the ball, gets a top edge which flies over the slips and goes to the boundary
loud grunt from Rubel as he bowls the ball, gets cut into the covers. Goes straight to the fielder and he stops the ball at head height
full toss, Latham gets down on one knee and sweeps the ball to the long leg boundary
gets onto the front foot and its driven through the covers
comes down the pitch and it hits the pad and goes into the off-side
sweeps the ball into the legside, gets enough to get it past the keeper
cut out to the cover sweeper
gets to the pitch of the ball and plays it back down the pitch to the keeper
gets onto the front foot and guides the ball to point
looks to guide the ball down to third man, misses and gets hit on the thigh pad, only the bowler appeals. Too high.
comes down the pitch and looks to tennis bat the ball back past the bowler. Slices off the bat and goes down to the third man boundary
classy shot here, its on legstump and Broom leans into the shot and flicks it along the ground to the mid-wicket boundary
wide of off-stump, Broom bends his knees and drops the bat down onto the ball. Goes along the ground to point
on legstump again from Rubel, flicked towards the mid-wicket boundary again. This time its too near the keeper and they can only get a couple. 10 off the over, maybe time for a rest for Rubel?
hits back to the bowler
defended into the off-side
clipped off the pads
down the legside, called a wide
gets forward and lets the ball run off the bat
flicks the ball in the air over the top of short mid-wicket.
gets onto the front foot and defends the ball square on the off-side
looks to flick the ball into the legside again, misses and gets hit on the pad again. Umpire turns down the appeal and Mortaza has his head in his hands, looked to be going down leg
good length ball, Latham gets onto the front foot and defends back down the pitch
on legstump and Latham doesn't get any bat on the ball, flicks the pad and goes down the legside
good length ball again, some room for Broom outside off-stump and its late cut down to third man
beaten outside off-stump! Its a little tempter of a ball outside off-stump, Latham reaches forward and is lucky not to edge through to the keeper
on legstump and its too easy for Latham to clip the ball down to long leg. Its wide enough for them to come back for a second
gets forward and the ball pops up off the bat, lands safe on the off-side
played back to the bowler
gets forward and whips the ball through mid-wicket, goes out to the fielder on the rope
comes round the wicket, gets forward and defends
goes down on one knee, gets over the ball and sweeps to the square leg boundary
goes back in the crease and turns the ball through square leg
its a short ball, Broom stays in the crease and fends at the ball. Misses and it goes through to the keeper
pitches the ball up to Broom, he gets onto the front foot and defends into the covers. Mosaddek fields
slower ball, Broom wants to turn the ball into the legside. Can only defend the ball back up the pitch
too much room outside off-stump, cuts the ball and doesn't time it. Goes into the ground and stopped at point
too much room again and this time he cuts the ball to the cover sweeper to bring up his fifty
defends the ball into the off-side, Latham wants the run and Broom rightly sends him back
waits in the crease and cuts the ball out to the cover sweeper
sweeps the ball towards the long leg boundary, its a juggling stop on the rope that saves a run, flicked the ball back into the field of play
clips the ball to short fine leg, Broom is late to set off and Mortaza throws at the non-strikers end. Broom dives to make his ground but the throw was wild
driven through extra cover
clipped into the legside and they run quickly
gets onto the front foot and driven out through the covers again
driven up to mid-off and it an easy single
takes a step down the pitch and guides the ball down to backward point. Throw comes into the non-strikers end, luckly they were backing up there
looks to clip the ball into the legside and misses, they still manage to run through for a single. Only the bowler appealed
wide of off-stump and its cut out to the cover sweeper
looks to turn the ball into the legside, hits the edge and goes into the off-side instead
shot, comes down the pitch as Mortaza is about to bowl. Drives the ball straight past the bowler and it goes to the boundary
turns the ball through square leg and Shakib has to run off the boundary to field
depends out to point
gets forward and sweeps the ball to the square leg boundary
goes back in the crease and hits back to the bowler
hits the ball in the air towards extra cover. Sarkar doesn't pick the ball up and dives forward and can't keep hold of the ball. Tough to call that a chance.
stays back in the crease and defends into the ground.
could have been another chance there! Its guided down towards backward point, he flies to his left and just can't gather the ball in
gets forward and punches the ball up to wide mid-on
lovely shot from Broom, gets down on one knee and flicks the ball on the bounce towards the square leg boundary.
its outside off-stump and Broom swings at the ball, misses and it goes through to Rahim behind the stumps
hits the ball hard into the ground and it pops up to the right hand side of Sabbir at point. Cover sweper tidies the ball up
plants the front foot down and swings through the line of the ball, goes high in the air towards cow corner. There are shouts of "catch it", no one there though and it goes to another boundary
Broom goes down and sweeps the ball towards square leg. Mortaza is in the perfect position and takes the catch just above his head. Takes the catch and then throws the ball into the ground.
gets onto the front foot and defends
gets in line and defends back down the pitch
skips down the pitch and drives the ball along the ground to long-on
goes back in the crease and plays with the spin out to deep square leg
comes down the pitch and flicks at the ball, goes up to long-on again
wide of off-stump and Taylor is happy to let the ball go through to the keeper
gets onto the front foot and looks to play the ball into the legside, gets a thick edge down to third man
good length ball, Latham has his eye in and clips the ball to wide mid-on
its wide of off-stump and Taylor throws the bat at the ball, gets a thick edge over the top of the slips. Went at that ball very hard
touch shorter and its played off the hip through square leg, Latham calls for the run
clips the ball down to long leg
Latham is gone! Goes back in the crease and looks to turn the ball into the legside, misses and it take his off-bail.
gets on the front foot and defends
lets the ball takes the edge, goes into the ground and Shakib dives to his left at slip to stop the ball
stays in the crease and plays back to the bowler
wide of off-stump from Nasir, it sits up nicely and Anderson cuts the ball to the extra cover boundary
goes back in the crease, plays with the spin and hits it up to short mid-wicket
full ball outside off-stump, driven into the covers and its stopped sharply by Mosaddek
good length ball outside off-stump, Taylor gets his bat high in the air and lets the ball go through to the keeper
gets onto the front foot and its driven through the covers, Sarkar runs in off the rope to field the ball
wide of off-stump again from the bowler, Anderson lets the ball go through to the keeper
another ball outside off-stump, cuts the ball down to third man
gets onto the front foot again and looks to edge a full ball down to third man. Doesn't get a good connection and it rolls out into the covers
cuts a faster ball down to Shakib at short third man
goes back in the crease and hits the ball up to long-off
gets onto the front foot and turns the ball through square leg
chips the ball in the air over the bowler head, lands well in front of long-off
comes down the pitch and turns the ball through mid-wicket, its wide enough of the close fielder to get a run
goes back in the crease and hits the ball hard along the ground to wide long-off
full ball, Anderson doesn't move his feet and drives the ball up to mid-off
flicks the pad and it takes it down towards long leg. The ball doesn't have much pace on it so it lets them come back for the second
good length ball, Anderson gets forward and defends the ball into the on-side
Anderson gets onto the front foot and gets a little inside edge back onto the pads. Mustafizur appeals although you could hear the edge from here
gets forward and it takes the outside edge of the bat, goes along the ground to point
full ball that Taylor looks to drive from the crease, doesn't time it and its an easy stop for extra cover
gets onto the front foot and defends
goes back in the crease and can't get the ball past extra cover
comes down the pitch to Nasir, driven hard to the long-off boundary, the fielder gets one hand to the ball and can't stop it going over the rope
clipped off the pads down to short fine leg
stays back in the crease and knocks the ball past short mid-wicket
hops back in the crease and hits the ball along the ground to long-on
angles the ball in towards Anderson, goes down the legside and Rahim has to dive to his right to stop it
too far outside off-stump and Anderson drives the ball to the extra cover boundary.
looks to turn a full ball into the legside, Mortaza runs in from short mid-wicket to field
goes short and its guided to backward point, fielder gets down early and makes an excellent stop to his right
full ball guided out into the covers, the throw comes into the non-strikers end and Anderson would have been home if it had hit
get onto the front foot and drives the ball towards extra cover, Mosaddek gets down to his left to stop the ball
gets onto the front foot and drives the ball back down the pitch. Mustafizur gets his left hand down and stops the ball on his follow-through
waits for the spin and plays the ball back down the pitch
goes back in the crease and punches the ball up to long-on
clips the ball off the pads through square leg
faster ball, Anderson goes back to defend and the ball almost gets through him
plays with the turn through square leg
comes down to the bowler and hits the ball back past him, jog the single as it goes up to long-on
clips the ball into the legside and its a smart diving stop at short mid-wicket
gets forward and its a thin edge down through the vacant slips, too fine for third man to cut that off
on legstump and its clipped down to wide long leg, they turn quickly to get another couple
looks to pull the ball into the legside, gets an underedge which lands at his feet. Taylor watches it very carefully to make sure it doesn't roll back onto the stumps
goes short and Taylor goes for the hook, took his eye off the ball. Still gets something on it and it goes down to long leg
good length ball, Anderson gets forward and lets the ball take the outside edge, goes down to third man
goes back in the crease and strokes the ball up to mid-off
clipped off the pads and its wide enough of short mid-wicket to get a run
hits the ball towards Mortaza at short mid-wicket. Dives to his left and gets one hand on the ball, can't stop the run
its pulled in the air towards the square leg boundary. Mahmudullah doesn't have to move and takes a simple catch. Big wicket for Bangladesh
gets on on legstump to start, turns the ball down to long leg
one step down the pitch, driven along the ground to long-on
goes short and Taylor is onto this in a flash. Pulls the ball into the on-side, gets it past a diving short mid-wicket and it goes to the rope
hits the ball along the ground to mid-on and charges down the other end.
lovely delivery from Rubel, beats Neesham's outside edge and goes through to the keeper. Rahim throws the ball into the air and the crowd think it was a catch...
its a short ball, Neesham sways out of the way and its through to Rahim again
yet another short ball, far too high this time as it goes over Neesham's head. Called a wide by the square leg umpire
moves the fielders back on the legside and then goes full to Neesham. He doesn't get fooled and lets the ball run off the face of the bat to third man
gets hit on the pad but the ball was going down the legside
clips the ball into the legside
hits back past the bowler
clips into the legside
dropped into the off-side and they run quickly
gets on the front foot and driven back up past the bowler
gets down to reverse sweep the ball, Mustafizur dives to his left at short third man to keep them to a single
looks to drive the ball forward, just gets enough on it to get it past the bowler.
good length ball, angles into Taylor. He leans forward and plays the ball through square leg, Shakib fields
leans back in the crease and hits the ball in the air to Mahmudullah at mid-off. Its a simple catch and Neesham is gone
full ball from the bowler, Santner gets onto the front foot and defends
wide outside off-stump and left alone.
outside off-stump and defended into the off-side again. Mortaza is racing through his overs here, doesn't want to get in trouble for over-rates again...
gets on the front foot and drives the ball past Shakib's ;eft hand up to long-off
gets on the front foot and defends back towards the bowler
hits the ball to short extra cover
faster delivery from Shakib, its past Santner's defensive push and it knocks off the bails. Santner just looks back at the stumps and can't belive he has been beaten.
cuts the ball out to the cover sweeper
faster ball across Taylor, he swings at the ball and misses. Goes through to the keeper
New Zealand are collapsing here! Its outside off-stump and Munro flashes at the ball, gets a thin edge and it goes through to the keeper.
Mortaza is charging in here and Henry looks to flick the ball into the legside, gets hit on the pad and the Umpire says not out to the appeal
gets some bat on this one and defends the ball out to Shakib at short extra cover
wide of off-stump and its driven forward, still can't beat extra cover
goes short to Henry, leans back and pulls the ball to the square leg boundary
gets onto the front foot and its tucked through square leg, Taylor calls for the run and they just get through safely
pitched up and its driven along the ground to long-off
swings through the line of the ball and it dribbles into the on-side
gets this one squarer through square leg for the single
gets down and sweeps the ball through long leg, lovely shot from Taylor
clips the ball into the legside and Rahim has to run from behind the stumps to field. Seems to keep running away from him and they come back for a second
comes down and clips the ball into the legside, Taylor is happy to only run a single to keep the strike
wide of off-stump, Taylor looks to slog sweep the ball into the legside and misses
full ball that Taylor looks to hit towards cow corner again. Gets a little edge which goes into the ground before the keeper
third time in a row he looks to hit this into the legside, this time he gets some bat on the ball and it flies to the mid-wicket boundary
hits the ball high into the air, doesn't go very far and lands safe in the legside. Rahim charged out from behind the stumps and couldn't catch up the ball
gets down and ramps the ball over the keepers head, just out of short fine legs reach and Taylor gets to his fifty
on legstump and its clipped towards the square leg boundary. Happy to just jog the single again to keep the strike
gets onto the front foot and guides the ball out to point, its an easy single as they are happy to get Taylor off strike
its a short ball, Henry wafts at the ball outside off-stump and misses. Goes through to the keeper, no foot movement again
250 comes up for New Zealand as Henry gets a thick edge down to wide third man
full ball, Henry is swinging at everything and can't beat the short mid-on fielder
looks to pull the ball into the legside and misses, bounces before it goes though to the keeper
looks to pull the ball into the legside again, still doesn't time it and the bowler gather it himself in his follow-through
good delivery from Rubel, its full and straight. Taylor has no room to swing at the ball and can only dig it out into the off-side
its on legstump and flicks some pad, Rahim dives to his left and can't stop the ball. Welcome runs for New Zealand
comes down the pitch and turns the ball into a full toss, gets a thick edge and it flies down towards third man
clips the ball off the pads down to long leg
Henry has a huge swing at the ball and misses. Rubel doesn't and his stumps gets knocked over, Rubel punches the air in delight
full ball, driven up to mid-on to finish the over
gets onto the front foot and hits the ball past a diving cover fielder
good full ball again from the bowler, this time Patel hits the ball towards the cover fielder and can't beat him
slower ball hits towards mid-on, Patel charges down the other end. The throw comes into the non-strikers end, if it had hit then Patel would have been out by a couple of feet!
driven off the front foot to the cover sweeper
hits the ball back towards the bowler, Mustafizur gets one hand to the ball and can't stop it.
another full ball from the bowler, dug out to the cover sweeper. Taylor is going to have the strike on the last over
full ball that Taylor looks to cut, beats him for pace and it goes through to the keeper. Great delivery from Rubel
clips the ball through the legside, the fielder is in quickly off the rope and they can only get a single
gets an inside edge down to long leg
dropped again! Taylor hits the ball towards Mahmudullah at long-on. Its a dolly of a catch and he just drops the ball, hangs his head in shame...
pulls the ball along the ground to long-on
hits the ball hard down the ground, the fielders are onto it quickly and they can only get a single.
comes round the wicket and Tamim wastes no time hitting Patel back down the ground. Goes over the sightscreen into the houses behind the ground!
plays with the spin and tucks it out to the mid-wicket boundary
its sliced in the air towards the fielder at backward point. Sarkar is gone for a Golden duck. Interesting first over!
gets onto the front foot and defends the ball back down the pitch
looks to pull the ball into the legside and doesn't time it. Goes down into the ground
gets hit on the pad as he tries to sweep the ball, the appeal goes up and the Umpire just shakes his head
gets a little tickle on a xball going down the legside, too fine and they get a run
Henry pins Sabbir on the back foot, gets hit on the pad and the appeal goes up again. Looks like it was going down leg
gets some bat on this one, defended back down the pitch to the bowler
beaten for pace again, gets hit on the thigh pad as he tries to flick the ball into the legside
goes down the legside and there is a noise as it passes the batsman, Ronchi gathers the ball and claims for the catch, must have flicked the pad though
clips off the legs and its fielded at long leg by Bennett
Sabbir ducks into a bouncer from Bennett, gets hit on the helmet and it goes down to fine leg. That could have hurt
goes back in the crease and clips the ball into the legside, easy single
wide of off-stump and Tamim gets his bat high in the air and goes through to the keeper
short on legstump, Tamim plays the ball off his hip down to long leg
touch slower from Bennett, squares Sabbir up as he defends the ball back down the pitch
comes down the pitch and looks to pull the ball into the on-side, doesn't quite time it and it dribbles to the close fielders on the legside
gets onto the front foot and defends the ball into the off-side
good length ball outside off-stump, drives the ball along the ground to mid-off
stays rooted in the crease and cuts the ball down to Bennett at third man
Henry goes short and it flies over the top of Sabbir's head, called a wide by the square leg Umpire
gets on the front foot again and driven up to mid-on
goes short and it bounces up towards the batsman's ribs, does well to defend the ball into the legside
its short again from Henry, Sabbir swivels on the backfoot and pulls the ball to the square leg boundary. Really flew off the bat
streaky shot. Its wide of off-stump and Tamim throws the bat at the ball, gets the outside edge and it just goes past 2nd slip
looks to clip the ball into the legside, gets an inside edge onto the pad
wide outside off-stump, ball swings back in after it passes the stumps. Tamim got his bat well out of the way
its a full ball from Bennett, Tamim gets onto the front foot and plays the ball back up the pitch
hits the ball back up the pitch, Sabbir set off for the run as Patel picked up the ball at mid-off. Throws down the stumps at the non-strikers end, Sabbir had just dived in his ground.
back of a length ball, Tamim gets in line and plays the ball back down the pitch.
good length ball from Henry, Sabbir gets inline and plays the ball back down the pitch
lovely shot from Sabbir, its driven hard through extra cover. Anderson chases the ball back and is kept interested all the way. Just beats him to the rope
hits the ball into the ground in front of the cover fielder
pitched up and the bat comes down and its jammed out towards point
its outside off-stump and its played into the on-side
its pulled hard into the legside, Munro runs along the boundary and puts in a full length dive. Gets one hand on the ball and can't stop it rolling into the boundary
Bennett continues and goes short to Tamim, the batsman gets up on his toes and plays the ball back down the pitch
clips the ball into the legside, Latham gets down at short mid-wicket and stops the ball
its a full ball outside off-stump, leans forward and defends the ball into the covers
wide of off-stump and Tamim lifts the ball down to third man, jogs to the other end
good length ball, Sabbir guides the ball out towards point
slower ball, gives him room outside off-stump. Guides the ball through backward point and its wide enough to come back for a second
its driven off the back foot, goes into the ground before popping up into Latham's hands at extra cover
slower ball outside off again, Tamim drops the hands and misses with a cut down to third man
pulls the ball into the legside, goes down towards long leg
full ball, Sabbir stays back in the crease and plays the ball back up to the bowler
cuts the ball square on the off-side, bounces into the ground and it takes all the pace off the ball. Stopped by cover point
gets onto the front foot and defends the ball into the off-side
Bennett takes a tumble as he bowls the ball, driven back up past him and Neesham fields at mid-on
outside off-stump and its driven up to mid-off, one bounce and into the fielders hands
Tamim drives the ball back past the bowler and sets off for the run, its very well placed and he gets home safely
looks to push the ball forward, takes the outside edge and it goes into the ground in front of point
its on legstump and Sabbir clips the ball to the mid-wicket boundary. Perfectly placed shot
wide of off-stump again, gets onto the front foot and drives the ball into the covers
plants the front foot down and lets the ball run off the face of the bat down to third man
strays down the legside, clips the pad as it goes through to the keeper
stays in the crease and defends the ball into the on-side
comes down the pitch and hits the ball up to Neesham at wide mid-on
its wide of off-stump again and Tamim reaches out and gets a thin edge on the ball. Takes it past the keeper and goes fine
drops the ball down in front of point, Broom is in quickly to stop the run.
full ball, Sabbir gets in line and plays the ball back down the pitch
gets a little bit of bat on a ball going down the legside, its travelling fine and they just manage to cut the ball off
defended out to point
on legstump again from Anderson, radar not quite in yet and its clipped down to long leg again
on legstump again to the left-handed Tamim, clipped down to long leg
Anderson is really struggling with his line here and goes down the legside
cuts the ball through the covers, Sabbir turns quickly at the non-strikers end and beats the throw back into the keeper
turned off his toes down to short fine leg
hits the ball on the full down to wide mid-on
hits the ball on the full back down the ground, Santner dives to his left and can't stop the ball
driven back to the bowler, Santner can stop it this time
flicks the ball past Latham at short mid-wicket
gets a large stride in down the pitch and plays the ball back down the to the bowler
drops short and is pulled to the square leg boundary, luckly for Anderson there is a fielder out there to stop the ball
gets on the front foot and drives the ball out to the cover sweeper
over the batsmans head
goes short again and its easily pulled into the legside by Tamim
short and wide outside off-stump, Sabbir hits the ball flat through cover point and a diving Munro can't stop the ball on the boundary
comes round the wicket and tucks the batsman up for room, gets hit on the pad. Was going down legside though
gives himslef some room and then cuts the ball into the ground. Point gets down on his knees and fields
its wide of off-stump, Tamim stays in the crease and punches the ball through the covers
waits for the spin and plays the ball down to short fine leg
full outside off-stump and misses with a late cut
goes back in the crease and plays the ball up to long-on
comes down the pitch and turns the ball into a full toss, hits it back past the bowler to long-off
turns the ball to short mid-wicket and that should be drinks
slower ball, dropped square on the off-side. Quick run
wide outside off-stump, Tamim isn't going to be tempted into playing and doesn't
its short and Tamim does play at this one. Pulls it into the on-side and bounces once before going over the mid-wicket rope
gets a fuller ball from Anderson, gets onto the front foot and plays it down the pitch
stays in the crease and late cuts the ball down to third man
missed out there, looks to flick a legside ball and misses. Clips the pad and short fine leg runs in to field
goes back in the crease and cuts the ball out to the cover sweeper
gets down and sweeps the ball, can't beat Bennett at short fine leg
guides the ball out to point and almost sells Tamim down the river as Sabbir sends him back
gets to the pitch of the ball and defends back down the pitch
comes down the pitch and hits the ball to extra cover, can't beat the fielder
goes back in the crease and drops the bat down on the ball, ends a tidy over from Santner
full ball, gets driven back towards the bowler. Neesham bends down and picks up the ball
wide of off-stump and its driven to the sweeper
goes short and its pulled out towards the mid-wicket boundary
gets down on one knee and slices the ball in the air over point, cut off just before the rope
gets onto the front foot and defends
good length ball again, outswinger and its left alone by Sabbir
it goes down the legside and the keeper can't stop the ball. Valuable runs for Bangladesh
turned to short mid-wicket
clipped down the legside and Taylor fields short
gets a thick edge on the ball that takes it just past the keeper, Bennett fields
comes down the wicket and drives the ball to long-on
hits the ball straight back past Santner, long-off races over and can't stop the ball
reaches forward and turns the ball through square leg, all the fielders are on the rope so its an easy single
comes round the wicket to Tamim, far too far outside off-stump
moves to 49 with a thick edge down to the third man boundary.
gets onto the front foot and guides the ball to backward point
guides the ball down to third man to bring up fifty for Tamim and 100 for Bangladesh
hits the ball in the air towards Patel at deep point, gets one hand on the ball and just can't hold on. Difficult chance
clipped off the pad down through square leg
Neesham tumbles over as he bowls the ball, don't think that put Sabbir off as he was just defending forward anyway
reaches forward and defends back down the pitch
faster ball turned round the corner, fielded
pulled through square leg and the fielder is onto it quickly
gets a large stride in and defends back down the pitch
faster ball rom Patel, turned up to long-on
short and wide out-side off-stump, cuts the ball out to Santner on the cover boundary. He gets the ball back in quickly and they still have enough time to come back for two
lovely delivery from Neesham, its right in the blockhole and the batsman does well to dig the ball out
turned into the legside, Latham makes a diving stop at mid-wicket
ball going down the legside and misses with a pull. Neesham can't believe its been called a wide
that one's easier to believe as it goes further down the legside
waits for the ball and guides it down to third man
full and wide of off-stump, Sabbir gets down on one knee and misses with the cut shot
rocks back in the crease and pulls a short ball back over the bowlers head. Bounces once before going over the long-on boundary
looks to drive the ball forward, misses and it goes through to the keeper. Long over there from Neesham
hits the ball in the air over short extra cover, its just out of Broom's reach
defends the ball square on the off-side and its an easy single again
hits the ball back up the pitch and Patel fields off his own bowling
lovely timing from Sabbir, waits for the ball and tickles it past the keeper. Goes so fine that third man can't cut it off
sweeps the ball towards long leg, Bennett goes haring after the ball and ends up diving over the ball
cuts the ball out to the cover sweeper
its a slow bouncer from Bennett, Sabbir is through the shot too quickly and it goes through to the keeper
wide of off-stump again, cuts the ball into the ground and it goes to point
goes for the slow ball again, its on legstump and clips the pad before going through to the keeper
Bennett goes short and Sabbir ducks as the ball goes through to the keeper
its short on legstump, too easy for Sabbir to clip the ball towards the square leg boundary
waits for the ball and guides it down to third man
loops the ball up, gets on the front foot and defends
drives the ball towards the extra cover boundary, Munro dives on the rope and saves a couple of runs.
waits for the ball to spin back into him and defends
hits thpad and goes down the legside
plays a late cut and its stopped by Taylor
rocks back onto the back foot and plays the ball to short extra cover
full ball hit on the bounce to short extra cover, Latham gets down to his right to field
another short ball from Bennett, Sabbir pulls out of the hook at the last moment
wide of off-stump and its another late cut down to third man
goes short again and this time Tamim doesn't time the pull, lands safe at square leg and the fielder runs in off the rope to field
Bennett takes yet another tumble as he goes short, Sabbir ducks under the ball again
full ball wide of off-stump from the bowler, Sabbir gets onto the front foot and plays the ball through the covers
waits for the ball and then flicks it into the legside
gets onto the front foot and drives the ball out to the cover sweeper
drops the ball into the mid-wicket area, all the fielders are back so its a risk free shot
late cuts the ball to short third man and Tamim calls for the quick run
hits the ball back to the bowler
unlucky! Tamim stays on the back foot and looks to cut the ball, just misses the outside edge and it goes through to the keeper
comes down the wicket and hits an inside out shot over the top of extra cover
outside off-stump and its cut out to the cover sweeper
goes back in the crease and turns the ball through square leg, all the fielders are on the boundary
clips the ball through square leg to the boundary
gets onto the front foot and plays the ball back down the pitch
its slog swept in the air towards the mid-wicket boundary. Bennett runs over from long-on and takes an excellent sliding catch right in front of us. Tamim goes..
swings through the ball and it goes along the ground to short mid-wicket
thick edges the ball to short third man
gets on the front foot and drives the ball to mid-wicket
spins the ball down the legside
gets onto the front foot and defends into the covers
gets on the front foot again and defends the ball back down the pitch
gets off the mark with a little dab down towards third man, Mosaddek knew if he could get it past the close fielder it would go to the boundary
comes down the pitch and shoves the pad at the ball, going down legside

its hit into the off-side and Mosaddek sets off for the run. They both end up at the strikers end and the throw comes into the non-strikers end. The Umpires check and its Sabbir that has to go. What a disaster of a run for Bangladesh!
spins the ball down the legside
plays the ball into the legside
cuts the ball square
gets an inside edge down to short fine leg
drives the ball up to long-on
gets onto the front foot and defends
goes back in the crease and cuts the ball to wide third man
gets on the front foot and defends the ball back to the bowler
goes back in the crease and gets hit on the pad, the Umpires finger goes up
gets a thick edge down to short third manm
gets hit on the pad, appeal goes up from the bowler, no one else though. Was going down the legside
good length ball, comes into Shakib, gets on the back foot and defends the ball back down the pitch
another ball outside off-stump, Shakib hits the ball back down the pitch and Henry gathers on his follow-through
on legstump and the ball is clipped through square leg, fielder comes in off the rope to collect the ball
gets onto the front foot and defends the ball to point, runs really dried up here for Bangladesh
looks to dad the ball down to third man, misses and it goes through to Ronchi behind the stumps
its full and wide of off-stump, Rahim gets onto the front foot and defends out to point
gets onto the front foot and plays the ball back to the bowler
gets on the front foot and drives the ball through the covers.
gets down early and flicks a legstump ball over Ronchi's head
gets down the pitch and hits the ball to short extra cover
give himself some room and cuts the ball to short third man, Bennett fields
defends the ball back up the pitch and Broom runs over to field
short ball, defended into the off-side, Rahim wants the run. Shakib definitely does not
gets a thick edge down to third man
Henry goes short and Shakib gets two feet off the ground trying to cut the ball, misses and it goes through to the keeper
gets onto the front foot and its an inside edge back onto the pads
full and wide outside off-stump. Shakib steps out and looks to drive the ball into the covers. Doesn't time it and it dribbles to point
clips the ball off the legs and it goes to square leg
gets to the pitch of the ball and whips it into the legside, straight to the fielder
gets a better connection on the ball and it goes to wide long-on
gets forward and defended into the off-side
touch wider of off-stump and its defended out to point, they get a quick single
flicks the ball off the pads down to deep square leg
plays with the spin and send the ball out to the cover sweeper
shot! Its in the slot and Rahim smashes the ball back over the bowlers head, goes flat over the long-off boundary. More of that please!
defends the ball out to point
full ball, dug out and driven back up to Bennett at long-off
wide of off-stump and its a late cut down to third man
its a touch short and Shakib is onto it in a flash. Pulls the ball to the mid-wicket boundary
wide of off-stump and its guided down to third man, they jog through for the single. Bangladesh will have loved that over, 12 off it
plays with the spin and clips the ball through backward square leg
cuts the ball past a diving backward point, gets tidied up on the boundary
comes down the pitch, big swing and goes back to the bowler
gets onto the front foot and defends, Ronchi runs from behind the stumps to field
hits the ball hafrd back down the pitch, straight back to the bowler
goes for a late cut and can't gets the ball past the short third man fielder
wide of off-stump and its cut out to the cover sweeper
its a full ball on legstump, defends the ball into the legside and Latham fields
lets the ball run off the outside edge down to third man
wide of off-stump again from Needsham, plays the late cut down to third man
slanted across Shakib, helps the ball on the way down to third man again
its a hit me ball on legstump and that's exactly what Rahim does. Clips the ball to the square leg boundary
waits for the ball and then places it out to the cover sweeper
gets onto the front foot and defends the ball out through gully, its an easy run
goes back in the crease and looks to defend, takes the outside edge and it goes fine past the keeper. No chance of anyone catching up with that
drives the ball forward and Broom fields at short extra cover
driven on the bounce to extra cover again
comes down the pitch and can only hit the ball to extra cover again, good end to the over from Patel
goes for a slower ball to start, Rahim hits the ball back past the bowler and shouts yes straight away. Good running
its pulled high in the air towards long leg, Santner gets under the ball and takes the catch just before the rope. Sounded great coming off the bat, just died before going over the rope
Bennett gets a big head of steam up and goes short, too short. Over the batsman's head
slower ball outside off-stump, Mahmudullah steps forward and defends into the covers
good length ball, gets the bat down and cross bats the ball out to point
full ball, slow ball, looked to be going down leg and the Umpire agrees. Not out
full ball again, Mahmudullah almost crosses his hands as he defends the ball out point
looks to turn the ball into the legside, bounces a bit more then expected and can only defend
clips the ball through square leg
full ball, gets the bat down and digs the ball to extra cover
goes back in the crease and cuts the ball to short third man
gets onto the front foot and drives the ball to long-off
cuts the ball square on the off-side, can't beat Broom at backward point
goes short and angles the ball into the batsman, cuts the ball hard into the ground and it goes into points hands
on legstump and its clipped down to long leg
full ball, Rahim knockes the ball out towards point and immediately shouts no
slower ball comes back into the batsman again, gives Rahim no room and he can only play the ball out to point again
What a class shot. Its a full ball again and Rahim  gets under the ball and ramps it over the keepers head.
drives the ball along the ground to Patel at wide mid-off. He picks up the ball and decides against throwing at the stumps
gets down early and sweeps the ball to the long leg boundary, both deep fielders chase it back and can't catch up
hangs back in the crease and turns the ball through square leg
comes down the pitch and hits the ball on the bounce, gets it to the right of the bowler and it goes up to long-on
gets on the front foot and turns the ball into the legside
hits the ball on the full and its clipped through square leg again
spins past the bat and gets hit on the back leg, big appeal from Patel. Umpire just shakes his head, and it looks to be going down leg again
slow full ball, dug out well and hit up to long-on. Runrate up over 7 an over now...
driven hard into the covers, Latham dives to his right and got one hand on the ball. Saved three runs there as the ball was going at some knots
hits the ball on the full and its driven up to Patel at long-off again
its coming back into the batsman from around the wicket, drops his hands and ramps the ball over Ronchi's head to go to the boundary
short ball, Mahmudullah has two feet off the ground as he cuts the ball in the air towards third man. Lands safe before the fielders on the rope
driven out to the cover sweeper
comes down the pitch and smashes the ball through the covers, the sweeper dives on the rope and can't stop the ball
gets an underedge on a ball trying to pull into the legside. Goes just past the stumps
tucks the ball into the legside and Santner charges off after the ball. Keeps them to a single
over pitched and its hit on the full out to the square leg boundary
drives the ball in the air through Latham's hands at extra cover, going too fast to call that a chance
hit out to the cover sweeper, every run getting a cheer from this crowd.
its a short ball pulled out to deep mid-wicket, pings off the bat and there is a fielder on the rope to stop the ball
gets onto the front foot and angles the ball through backward point, Broom can't stop the ball and they get another
it wide of off-stump again from Bennett, gets out to the ball and guides it down to third man
its another short ball from Bennett, far to short again and the square leg Umpire calls it a wide
its another short ball, Mahmudullah is up on his toes as he lifts the ball over the slips and goes fine to the third man boundary.
much better ball, in the blockhole and played back to the bowler
clips the ball through square leg and its another couple of runs nearer the win
gets a little tickle on the ball down the legside, goes to fine leg and Bennett fields
its pulled towards the backward square leg boundary, Bennett chases the ball and can't catch it up. That's 3000 ODI runs for Mahmudullah
gets onto the front foot and plays the ball into the off-side. No chance of a run there as the bowler runs down and fields
skips down the pitch and the bowler sees him coming, drops short and the batsman can't get anything on the ball
good bouncer that time, Mahmudullah looks to pull the ball and misses.
Henry goes short and gthe ball is pulled into the legside, it lands safe and goes out to the fielder on the boundary
its yet another short ball from Bennett, the batsman tries to pull the ball into the legside, gets nothing on it and it goes through to the keeper
its in the slot and Mahmudullah look to pull the ball into the legside, goes over the top of Santner's head at mid-on and races away to the rope
full ball, driven up along the ground to Patel at long-off
slower ball outside off-stump and Rahim waits for the ball, guides it down to third man
its a short ball and its pulled towards the square leg boundary. It keeps going and it lands just over the rope. The crowd erupts here..
gets up on his toes and plays the ball out to point. Loud shout of no from Rahim, don't need another run out at this stage.
wide of off-stump, cuts the ball into the ground and its stopped at backward point
clips the ball into the legside, its past the close fielder and Bangladesh edge a run closer
expects the short ball and gets it. Angles the bat and lifts it down to third man
get another short ball, Rahim gets on top of the ball and plays it down through square leg
Yorker from Henry, the batsman are swinging at everything and its an inside edge through square leg
its pulled out to the deep square leg boundary, 5 runs needed
cuts the ball out to the cover sweeper, Munro gets down to field
its over, its all over. Its a short ball and Mahmudullah pulls the ball to the mid-wicket boundary to win the game
